牕字的基本解释

牕
chuāng
同“窗”。

牕字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chuāng］
［《集韻》初江切，平江，初。］
亦作“牎1”。亦作“牕1”。“葱2”的被通假字。“囱1”的今字。亦作“窓1”。亦作“窻1”。亦作“1”。亦作“1”。
(1)设在屋顶或壁上用以透光通风的洞口。今一般装有窗扇。
(2)茶炉通风漏灰的洞。
[②]［cōng］
［《集韻》麤叢切，平東，清。］
亦作“牎2”。亦作“牕2”。
烟突；灶上烟囱。

牕字的康熙字典解释

【巳集中】【片字部】　牕； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页694第11
【正韻】初莊切，音瘡。通孔也。亦作窗囪。俗作牎。◎按牎非俗字。玉篇，廣韻，集韻本作牎。正韻始作牕。倂入陽韻。詳上牎字註。

Miao
chuāng
Same as "window".
Miao
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chuāng］
["Ji Yun" Chu Jiang Qi, Ping Jiang, Chu. ]
Also known as "牎1". Also known as "牕1". The false word for "onion 2". The present word for "Chamn 1". Also known as "窓1". Also known as "窻1". Also called "1". Also called "1".
(1) An opening on the roof or wall for light transmission and ventilation. Window sashes are generally installed today.
(2) A hole for ventilating and leaking ash from the tea stove.
[②]［cōng］
["Ji Yun" rough cut, Pingdong, Qing. ]
Also known as "牎2". Also known as "牕2".
Smoke bursts; the stove tops the chimney.
Miao
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Collection] [Film Word Department] 　牕; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 694 No. 11
[Zheng Yun] Chuzhuang cut, sound sore. Through holes also. Also used as a window stack. Vulgar. ◎According to non-vulgar characters. Yupian, Guangyun, Jiyun is the original version. Zhengyun began to make a scorpion. Sui into Yang Yun. Detailed note on the letter.
